message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many of our customers. It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on something truly special. I'm offering it to you for $85 today.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Can you consider a price adjustment?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. After considering your offer, I believe we can find common ground. I would like to counter with an offer of $75 for the product.
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. Can you consider a price of $72?
Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to meet you closer to your proposed price. My counteroffer is $73 for the product.
I'm getting close, but I think we can do a bit better. How about $71?
I see your point, Bob. Considering our previous discussions, I am willing to offer the product for $72.
